profile.name: Adonai
profile.title: Software Developer/Engineer, Application/Web Developer
profile.description:
Result-driven software engineer and web developer with over 4+ years of experience and proficiency in designing and implementing user interfaces, coding, debugging, frontend, and backend technologies, as well as maximizing the profitability of businesses, websites, and mobile applications by achieving client and corporate objectives. Expertise in software development, programming languages, E-Commerce, SEO, and database management, as well as an in-depth knowledge of IT platforms. Proficient in analyzing complex situations, maintaining productive and cooperative relationships, and exercising sound judgment.
A vital team member who excels at conceiving effective strategies and tactics to improve the quality of the customer experience while delivering top-notch services.

challenges.description: Skills: Optimización para motores de búsqueda (SEO) · WordPress

As the mastermind behind the athlete management dashboard, I took charge of its creation for exclusive internal use. As a valuable member of the team, I contributed to the development process and expertly resolved any issues that arose. My responsibilities included conducting thorough research and analysis to identify the underlying causes and provide effective solutions.

I was tasked with creating web3 NFT collection websites for https://irishplayersclub.com. With my expertise in frontend and backend development, I have successfully worked with databases such as MongoDB and Firestore. As the head of special projects at ETECSA, Cuba's sole telecommunications provider, I spearheaded the development of a highly effective web platform for clients utilizing the company's internet services. Additionally, I designed a web system to streamline fuel management and handling, resulting in a 90% satisfaction rate among department staff. 

My approach to client complaints was swift and effective, presenting solutions and alternatives in a timely manner and following up to ensure complete resolution. I remained at the forefront of emerging technologies, constantly seeking new ways to enhance the department's technological landscape. manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: My ideal job is where I can interact with my work colleagues, constantly learn and set new goals by adding value to the company. But above all things that my salary allows me to live well.
